Perplexity AI vs. Google

(hint: this is why Google is dying)

☑ Left: I ask Google for the best Parisian tours.
☑ Right: I ask Perplexity for the same question.

And the results are not even comparable.

↳ Google wants you to click on 4x different sponsored links. It's a $40bn a year industry.

↳ Perplexity gives you the straight answer. No clicking, no scrolling. Everything in 2-5 seconds.

I ran similar tests with ChatGPT-o3 + search, Claude + search, or even Gemini (from Google itself).

And the market knows it: Alphabet (= Google) is down 5% since last year. No sign of recovery.

Perplexity recently raised $500 million at a $14 billion valuation. Rumors said Apple tried to buy it.
